name: Attic Whisperer

specials.name: Aura of Sobs
specials.description: 10ft. All of the voices that an attic whisperer steals linger around it in an invisible but audible aura of unnerving childlike whimpers, songs, and sobs. Any living creature that enters this area loses the benefit of effects with the emotion trait and takes a –1 status penalty on all attack rolls, damage rolls, and Will saving throws. The attic whisperer can suppress or reactivate its aura as a free action.

specials.name: Steal Breath
specials.description: Requirement The Attic Whisperer successfully hit a creature with its last action Effect The creature becomes unable to breathe. At the start of each turn, they must succeed on a DC 20 Will save or be forced to hold their breath. This effect lasts 1 minute or until they succeed at their save.

specials.name: Steal Voice
specials.description: A creature critically hit by an attic whisperer’s attacks must succeed at a DC 20 Will save or lose the ability to speak for 1 minute (1 hour on a critical failure). During that time, the creature cannot talk, cast spells with verbal components, or use effects with the verbal trait. Once an attic whisperer has stolen a creature’s voice, it can perfectly mimic that voice at any time, even after its victim’s voice has returned, and while using that voice can speak any languages the victim knew. Those familiar with an individual’s voice can make a Perception check against the attic whisperer’s Deception DC to realise a mimicked voice is inauthentic.

specials.name: Goodnight Kiss
specials.description: A sleeping creature kissed by the attic whisperer falls into a permanent sleep and is subject to Steal Voice. The sleeper can only be roused by killing the attic whisperer or by using dispel magic, remove curse, or similar effects.

description: This thing resembles a gray, emaciated child, with cobwebs and dust for clothes and a fox skull for a head, although you'd only know that if you managed to see through its childish disguise.
spells: charm, illusory disguise (at will), sleep (at will)

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyze, poison, unconscious
